notesStmt.note: In four parts. Part 2 caption title reads: How to aduise and comfort them that lye in prison, and be by the magistrate iudgged to dye. Part 3 caption title reads: A faithful and Christian exhortation to repentaunce, and to leade a life in the feare of God. Part 4 caption title reads: An instruction to teache children howe they ought to goe to the Lordes table.
A note at the head of part 4 says that it has been adapted to English use.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
